00061 static int mdd_xattr_get(const struct lu_env *env,
00062                          struct md_object *obj, struct lu_buf *buf,
00063                          const char *name);
00064 
00065 int mdd_la_get(const struct lu_env *env, struct mdd_object *obj,
00066                struct lu_attr *la)
00067 {
00068         int rc;
00069 
00070         if (mdd_object_exists(obj) == 0) {
00071                 CERROR("%s: object "DFID" not found: rc = -2\n",
00072                        mdd_obj_dev_name(obj), PFID(mdd_object_fid(obj)));
00073                 return -ENOENT;
00074         }
00075 
00076         rc = mdo_attr_get(env, obj, la);
00077         if (unlikely(rc != 0)) {
00078                 if (rc == -ENOENT)
00079                         obj->mod_flags |= DEAD_OBJ;
00080                 return rc;
00081         }
00082 
00083         if (la->la_valid & LA_FLAGS &&
00084             la->la_flags & LUSTRE_ORPHAN_FL)
00085                 obj->mod_flags |= ORPHAN_OBJ | DEAD_OBJ;
00086 
00087         return 0;
00088 }

00090 struct mdd_thread_info *mdd_env_info(const struct lu_env *env)
00091 {
00092         struct mdd_thread_info *info;
00093 
00094         lu_env_refill((struct lu_env *)env);
00095         info = lu_context_key_get(&env->le_ctx, &mdd_thread_key);
00096         LASSERT(info != NULL);
00097         return info;
00098 }

00100 struct lu_buf *mdd_buf_get(const struct lu_env *env, void *area, ssize_t len)
00101 {
00102         struct lu_buf *buf;
00103 
00104         buf = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_buf[0];
00105         buf->lb_buf = area;
00106         buf->lb_len = len;
00107         return buf;
00108 }
00109 
00110 const struct lu_buf *mdd_buf_get_const(const struct lu_env *env,
00111                                        const void *area, ssize_t len)
00112 {
00113         struct lu_buf *buf;
00114 
00115         buf = &mdd_env_info(env)->mti_buf[0];
00116         buf->lb_buf = (void *)area;
00117         buf->lb_len = len;
00118         return buf;
00119 }

00121 struct lu_object *mdd_object_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00122                                    const struct lu_object_header *hdr,
00123                                    struct lu_device *d)
00124 {
00125         struct mdd_object *mdd_obj;
00126 
00127         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(mdd_obj, mdd_object_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00128         if (mdd_obj != NULL) {
00129                 struct lu_object *o;
00130 
00131                 o = mdd2lu_obj(mdd_obj);
00132                 lu_object_init(o, NULL, d);
00133                 mdd_obj->mod_obj.mo_ops = &mdd_obj_ops;
00134                 mdd_obj->mod_obj.mo_dir_ops = &mdd_dir_ops;
00135                 mdd_obj->mod_count = 0;
00136                 o->lo_ops = &mdd_lu_obj_ops;
00137                 return o;
00138         } else {
00139                 return NULL;
00140         }
00141 }
00142 
00143 static int mdd_object_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *o,
00144                            const struct lu_object_conf *unused)
00145 {
00146         struct mdd_device *d = lu2mdd_dev(o->lo_dev);
00147         struct mdd_object *mdd_obj = lu2mdd_obj(o);
00148         struct lu_object  *below;
00149         struct lu_device  *under;
00150         ENTRY;
00151 
00152         mdd_obj->mod_cltime = 0;
00153         under = &d->mdd_child->dd_lu_dev;
00154         below = under->ld_ops->ldo_object_alloc(env, o->lo_header, under);
00155         if (IS_ERR(below))
00156                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(below));
00157 
00158         lu_object_add(o, below);
00159 
00160         RETURN(0);
00161 }
00162 
00163 static int mdd_object_start(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *o)
00164 {
00165         int rc = 0;
00166 
00167         if (lu_object_exists(o)) {
00168                 struct mdd_object *mdd_obj = lu2mdd_obj(o);
00169                 struct lu_attr *attr = MDD_ENV_VAR(env, la_for_start);
00170 
00171                 rc = mdd_la_get(env, mdd_obj, attr);
00172         }
00173 
00174         return rc;
00175 }
00176 
00177 static void mdd_object_free(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_object *o)
00178 {
00179         struct mdd_object *mdd = lu2mdd_obj(o);
00180 
00181         lu_object_fini(o);
00182         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(mdd, mdd_object_kmem);
00183 }
00184 
00185 static int mdd_object_print(const struct lu_env *env, void *cookie,
00186                             lu_printer_t p, const struct lu_object *o)
00187 {
00188         struct mdd_object *mdd = lu2mdd_obj((struct lu_object *)o);
00189         return (*p)(env, cookie, LUSTRE_MDD_NAME"-object@%p(open_count=%d, "
00190                     "valid=%x, cltime="LPU64", flags=%lx)",
00191                     mdd, mdd->mod_count, mdd->mod_valid,
00192                     mdd->mod_cltime, mdd->mod_flags);
00193 }

00196         .loo_object_init    = mdd_object_init,
00197         .loo_object_start   = mdd_object_start,
00198         .loo_object_free    = mdd_object_free,
00199         .loo_object_print   = mdd_object_print,

00204                                    const struct lu_fid *f)

00206         return md2mdd_obj(md_object_find_slice(env, &d->mdd_md_dev, f));
